classes.class_description: Masters of arcane arts who wield devastating magical powers from a distance. Mages excel at area damage and magical utility but are fragile in direct combat.
Fierce melee combatants who rely on raw physical power and aggression. Brawlers excel at close-quarters combat and can take significant punishment.
Cunning specialists in stealth, precision strikes, and battlefield mobility. Rogues excel at hit-and-run tactics and exploiting enemy weaknesses.
Divine practitioners who mend wounds and support allies with protective magic. Healers are essential for sustaining a party through prolonged battles.
Tactical leaders who excel at coordinating allies and controlling the battlefield. Commanders provide strategic advantages and inspire their team to greater heights.
